column4: I installed ubuntu 10.10 about 2 hours ago and everything went fine but the 11.04 upgrade was in update manager so I decided to upgrade my ubuntu but
my tablet stuck on boot about 15 minutes now
should i still wait for it or should i reformat my tablet?
I installed ubuntu 10.10 about 2 hours ago and everything went fine but the 11.04 upgrade was in update manager so I decided to upgrade my ubuntu but my tablet stuck on boot about 15 minutes now

HELP ME PLEASE!I installed ubuntu 10.10 about 2 hours ago and everything went fine but the 11.04 upgrade was in update manager so I decided to upgrade my ubuntu but my tablet stuck on boot about 15 minutes now.what can I do now?reformat to 10.10 or do somethin else?
in ubuntu 10.10 everythin went right with no errors
nope a black screen i can see
can you boot into recovery mode
it would help if you disabled the boot splash to identify the problem
read https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Grub2#Editing%20Menus%20During%20Boot in particular you want to set nosplash instead of splash
